all.Name: About a Chair (AAC 22) by HAY
all.Body:
The About series is HAY’s most versatile furniture series. It began with a chair and blossomed into a series with virtually unlimited potential for residential or commercial. With the About series, Hee Welling has proven that a single strong idea can hold a wealth of development options. The About series is a true pragmatist, able to blend in or stand out, depending on the task it is assigned. Dramatize the silhouette with heavier upholstery, or opt for more subtle materials and colours. The many colour, upholstery and frame options are a particularly strong feature that allows you to tweak the design without compromising the basic concept. 

This AAC 22 is a curvy version of About a Chair and is designed to be supportive even for your arms, so you can just sit back and let the chair do the work. This version of About a Chair is available with three upholstery options: full upholstery of the whole shell, upholstery on the front of the rounded shell or a seat cushion. All three versions allow you to vary the expression with relatively simple variations in upholstery, which of course owes a great deal to fabric textures and colours. 

 2 Year Warranty

DIMENSIONS
W 59 x D 52 x H 46/79 cm

MATERIALS
Shell: 
Solid-coloured polypropylene

Base: 
Soap treated oak
Lacquered oak 
Black stained oak
With plastic or felt gliders

COLOURS
Shell: 
White
Black
Grey

all.Name: About a Chair Armless  (AAC-12)
all.Body:
The About series is HAY’s most versatile furniture series. It began with a chair and blossomed into a series with virtually unlimited potential. With the About series, Hee Welling has proven that a single strong idea can hold a wealth of development options. Today.  The About series is a true pragmatist, able to blend in or stand out, depending on the task it is assigned. Dramatize the silhouette with heavier upholstery, or opt for more subtle materials and colours. The many colour, upholstery and frame options are a particularly strong feature that allows you to tweak the design without compromising the basic concept.

About a Chair is an intuitive take on the concept of a chair. The organic posture provides good lumbar support, and the open shell invites you to take a seat. About a Chair comes in a dyed plastic version as well as a version with either frontal or full upholstery in hard-wearing furniture fabrics combined with round legs in soap-finished or lacquered oak or ash wood stained black. The many possible combinations of frame, shell and colours make About a Chair an ultra-flexible and versatile chair that celebrates individuality.

 2 Year Warranty

 

Shipping

If shipping is required we will need to quote.  Please enquire prior to ordering with the quantity of stools you would like

all.Name: About a Stool by Hay
all.Body:
The Hay About A Stool is the product of a close collaboration between designer Hee Welling and Hay. It is a simple yet functional design that lends itself to all interior environments.  The seat is bolted to a large high quality metal plate that is moulded into the seat.  This is a stool that will last a lifetime in design and material and is superbly comfortable to sit on due to the slopping back rest which provides great support.

Dimensions
Available in two heights: 75cm & 85cm
Height: 75cm (Seat Height: 65cm) x Width: 47cm x Depth: 43cm.  Domestic purpose.
Height: 85cm (Seat Height: 75cm) x Width: 47cm x Depth: 46cm.  Commercial purpose.

Materials & finishes
Shell in polypropylene with oak veneered or black stained ash frame and black powder coated steel foot rest.

 

Shipping

If shipping is required we will need to quote.  Please enquire prior to ordering with the quantity of stools you would like

all.Name: Harlem Shelf 1400
all.Body:
DESCRIPTION 
Distinctly ideal to display or store books, magazines, menus, art, mirrors, and physical objects that lean towards exposure and ease of access. Matte powder coat finishing in white and black for a sophisticated yet understated appeal.  Colour match a Disc or choose contrasting colours.

all.Name: KIN 1
all.Body:
KIN1

The KIN 1 is the single shelf option and is available in 2 widths; 800mm and 1400mm.

KIN SHELVING SYSTEM

A sleek and modern modular shelving system is designed to compliment the home, office or a retail space while not using up precious floor space. Made from high tensile corrosive resistant T6 aluminum, each shelf can hold up to 50-80kgs (when mounted into solid studs / nogs). Treated with matte black anodizing, a scratch resistant long lasting protection for damp or marine environments.
Designed by the principles of simple functionality, clean and uncluttered details are key. Look closer, you cannot see any screws.
We have designed the vertical bars to be positioned at 600mm and 1200mm to align with stud widths in conventional framed walls. If mounting to masonry or solid boards please use the appropriate fasteners as we include square head screws and GIB anchors.

DESIGN IDEAS

Bathroom to store towels, bathrobes, beauty & bath products or planters.
Lounge to display objects, books, or use as an entertainment wall with a TV.
Kitchen to store kitchenware or tableware.
Office to hold folders, art, pictures, books, planters or stationary.
Retail to display goods for sale or use.
Kids room to store books, toys and storage boxes.

SPECIFICATIONS

Shelf material: AL 5032
Barre / Rod / Disc & Cap material: AL 6061 T6
Holds up to 50kg per shelf (when mounted into solid studs / nogs)
L x H x D : 800 or 1400 x 190 x 320 mm 

Please note this product requires assembly.

CUSTOMISATION

We can offer a custom service to our KIN shelf system. Due to the flexible and modular design we can change the colour of the shelves and all the components. Or, if you require the shelves to fit a specific space on your wall and requires a different length, we can work with you to make it suit your needs.

The initial consultation where we discuss your design modifications is free of charge. Then, once we have all your detailed requirements we will be able to provide a concise quote for the project.

Please note, changing the design requires new drawings and technical calculations to ensure the overall size is feasible. Design fee charges will apply in order for us to deliver a solution. Please contact us so we can discuss your ideas shop@zavedo.nz .

LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 4 working days.
If NOT in stock delivery will be 8 weeks.
Any questions regarding lead times and delivery please call to discuss.

DOWNLOADS

KIN SHELVING BROCHURE .pdf
KIN SHELVING INSTALLATION GUIDE .pdf

SHIPPING

This item requires special delivery. We will contact you within one business day to discuss shipping arrangements and fees. Please email shop@zavedo.nz for a quote.
For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

WARRANTY

2 years

CARE & MAINTENANCE

Our products have been designed to last a life time. To ensure the longevity of your furniture, we recommend that it should be checked regularly for scratches, stains, and any other damage to ensure repairs are minimal and manageable.
Follow this LINK for detailed care of the KIN shelving.
If you have any queries, please email shop@zavedo.nz

RETURNS
This item is refundable within 14 days of delivery. The customer is responsible for all return shipping costs. Please email shop@zavedo.nz if you need any further assistance.
Custom orders will not be refundable.

all.Name: KIN 3

KIN 3

The KIN 3 is a 3 shelf option and is available in 2 widths; 800mm and 1400mm.

KIN SHELVING SYSTEM

A sleek and modern modular shelving system is designed to compliment the home, office or a retail space while not using up precious floor space. Made from high tensile corrosive resistant T6 aluminum, each shelf can hold up to 50 - 80 kgs (when mounted into solid  studs / nogs). Treated with matte black anodizing, a scratch resistant long lasting protection for damp or marine environments.
Designed by the principles of simple functionality, clean and uncluttered details are key. Look closer, you cannot see any screws.
We have designed the vertical bars to be positioned at 600mm and 1200mm to align with stud widths in conventional framed walls. If mounting to masonry or solid boards please use the appropriate fasteners as we include square head screws and GIB anchors.

DESIGN IDEAS

Bathroom to store towels, bathrobes, beauty & bath products or planters.
Lounge to display objects, books, or use as an entertainment wall with a TV.
Kitchen to store kitchenware or tableware.
Office to hold folders, art, pictures, books, planters or stationary.
Retail to display goods for sale or use.
Kids room to store books, toys and storage boxes.

SPECIFICATIONS

Shelf material: AL 5032
Barre / Rod / Disc & Cap material: AL 6061 T6
Holds up to 50kg per shelf (when mounted into solid studs / nogs)
L x H x D : 800 or 1400 x 590 x 320 mm

CUSTOMISATION

We can offer a custom service to our KIN shelf system. Due to the flexible and modular design we can change the colour of the shelves and all the components. Or, if you require the shelves to fit a specific space on your wall and requires a different length, we can work with you to make it suit your needs.

The initial consultation where we discuss your design modifications is free of charge. Then, once we have all your detailed requirements we will be able to provide a concise quote for the project.

Please note, changing the design requires new drawings and technical calculations to ensure the overall size is feasible. Design fee charges will apply in order for us to deliver a solution. Please contact us so we can discuss your ideas shop@zavedo.nz .

all.Name: Lunar 365 Mirror
all.Body:
DESCRIPTION

This handcrafted frameless mirror features polished edges, a 50mm polished edge hole and a genuine leather strap with precision machined 2 part attachment disc.  The back is covered in matt black vinyl for safety and 2 leather discs to offset against the wall for a perfect drop shadow effect.

The Lunar 365 is perfect for those small spaces or bedrooms that need reflection or nest the 365 with the 590 for a chic artistic effect.

2 year warranty.

DOWNLOADS

Instal Instruction.  PDF

Mirror Look Book

SPECIFICATIONS

Height: 690mm

Diameter: 365mm

Thickness: 5mm

Weight: 1.1 Kilograms

5mm float glass with flat polished edges and flat polished hole with matt black vinyl backing for safety.

INCLUDES

Mirror

Leather strap

ZAVEDO Disc

1 Chicago screw

1 square head counter sunk screw.  

1 Gib anchor rated to 13.6 kilo grams.

For high quantity orders please allow 2 weeks for production.

all.Name: Porto 144 Mirror
all.Body:
DESCRIPTION

The Porto Mirror is of the same family as the Luna Mirror and is designed with an aesthetically pleasing 590mm radius top and bottom while employing the golden ratio. We have wall mounted this full length mirror to keep the floor uncluttered and free from tripping and cleaning. Installation is so simple, the ZAVEDO disc is mounted to a wall by one counter sunk screw and is held up by a natural leather strap. Install time is less than 5 minutes.

Place the Porto Mirror in any room where you want increase light or see a head to toe view of yourself.

 SPECIFICATIONS

5mm float glass with flat polished edges and flat polished hole with matt black vinyl backing for safety.

W: 590mm

H: 1650mm (overall

T: 5mm

Weight: 9.9 Kg.

Glass load safety factor 65%.

INCLUDES

Mirror

Leather strap

ZAVEDO Disc

1 square head counter sunk screw. 

1 Gib anchor rated to 13.6 kilo grams.

DOWNLOADS

Installation Instruction

Mirror Look Book

LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 3 working days.

If NOT in stock delivery will be 2 weeks.

SHIPPING

This item requires special delivery. We will contact you within one business day to discuss shipping arrangements and fees. Please email shop@zavedo.nz for a quote.
For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

WARRANTY

2 years

Our products have been designed to last a life time. To ensure the longevity of your furniture, we recommend that it should be checked regularly for scratches, stains, and any other damage to ensure repairs are minimal and manageable.

Follow this LINK for detailed care of the PORTO mirror components.
If you have any queries, please email shop@zavedo.nz

RETURNS

This item is refundable within 14 days of delivery. The customer is responsible for all return shipping costs. Please email shop@zavedo.nz if you need any further assistance.
Custom orders will not be refundable.

all.Name: SOHO HOOK 100
all.Body:
DESCRIPTION

The SOHO HOOK is part of Zavedo's first self-designed Collection, called The Wall Collection. This is a collection of wall products that combines our appreciation for refined, practical, versatile and timeless design. For us detail, quality of material and engineering precision is key in this line. 

SOHO HOOK is a sophisticated, minimalist hook designed to hold your jacket, coat, robe, towel, apron, or any home object that needs to be hung or displayed with a little style.  For use in the bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, reception, retail and commercial spaces.

The hook is a 2 piece construction with a base and a cap. The base is screwed into a wall, door or cabinet with a supplied counter sunk square head screw.  The cap threads onto the base to hide the screw.

The grooved edge detailing is more than aesthetic, its purpose is to provide extra grip for items that would be draped over the edge.

DESIGN IDEAS
  • Mix and match colours and diameters for a random look.
  • Use 3 for balance and harmony.
  • The SOHO 100 can be used for cabinetry pullers or for a dramatic effect.
  • Use the SOHO 100 to hold shopping bags in any retail environment so you can display your brand with a touch of class and have the bags easily accessible.
SPECIFICATION
  • Diameter: 100mm.
  • Depth: 35mm.
  • Material: AL 6061 T6, high tensile alloy.  Solid Brass.
  • Colours:  Matte black anodising.  Matte white powder coat. Solid Brass.
  • Note: The brass will patina over time.
DOWNLOADS
  • Product specification. PDF
  • Install instruction. PDF
LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 3 working days.

If NOT in stock delivery will be 4 weeks.

SHIPPING

Shipping within NZ will be calculated at checkout. 

For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

    WARRANTY

    2 years

    CARE & MAINTENANCE

    Our products have been designed to last a life time. To ensure the longevity of your furniture, we recommend that it should be checked regularly for scratches, stains, and any other damage to ensure repairs are minimal and manageable.

    Follow this link for detailed care of the SOHO hooks. 

    If you have any queries, please email shop@zavedo.nz .

    RETURNS

    This item is refundable within 14 days of delivery. The customer is responsible for all return shipping costs. Please email shop@zavedo.nz if you need any further assistance.

    Custom orders will not be refundable.

The hook is a 2 piece construction with a base and a cap. The base is screwed into a wall, door or cabinet with a supplied counter sunk square head screw.  The cap threads onto the base to hide the screw.

The grooved edge detailing is more than aesthetic, its purpose is to provide extra grip for items that would be draped over the edge.

DESIGN IDEAS
  • Mix and match colours and diameters for a look random look.
  • Use 3 for balance and harmony.
  • The SOHO 50 can be used for cabinetry pullers or for a dramatic effect use the SOHO 100.
  • Use the SOHO 50 to hold shopping bags in any retail environment so you can display your brand with a touch of class and have the bags easily accessible.
SPECIFICATION
  • Diameter: 50mm.
  • Depth: 35mm.
  • Material: AL 6061 T6, high tensile alloy.  Solid Brass.
  • Colours:  Matte black anodising.  Matte white powder coat. Solid Brass.
  • Note: The brass will patina over time.
DOWNLOADS
  • Product specification. PDF
  • Install instruction. PDF
LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 3 working days.

If NOT in stock delivery will be 4 weeks.

SHIPPING

Shipping within NZ will be calculated at checkout. 

For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

    WARRANTY

    2 years

    CARE & MAINTENANCE

    Our products have been designed to last a life time. To ensure the longevity of your furniture, we recommend that it should be checked regularly for scratches, stains, and any other damage to ensure repairs are minimal and manageable.

    Follow this link for detailed care of the SOHO hooks. 

    If you have any queries, please email shop@zavedo.nz .

    RETURNS

    This item is refundable within 14 days of delivery. The customer is responsible for all return shipping costs. Please email shop@zavedo.nz if you need any further assistance.

    Custom orders will not be refundable.

chairs.Name: About a Chair Armless  (AAC-12)
chairs.Body:
The About series is HAY’s most versatile furniture series. It began with a chair and blossomed into a series with virtually unlimited potential. With the About series, Hee Welling has proven that a single strong idea can hold a wealth of development options. Today.  The About series is a true pragmatist, able to blend in or stand out, depending on the task it is assigned. Dramatize the silhouette with heavier upholstery, or opt for more subtle materials and colours. The many colour, upholstery and frame options are a particularly strong feature that allows you to tweak the design without compromising the basic concept.

About a Chair is an intuitive take on the concept of a chair. The organic posture provides good lumbar support, and the open shell invites you to take a seat. About a Chair comes in a dyed plastic version as well as a version with either frontal or full upholstery in hard-wearing furniture fabrics combined with round legs in soap-finished or lacquered oak or ash wood stained black. The many possible combinations of frame, shell and colours make About a Chair an ultra-flexible and versatile chair that celebrates individuality.

 2 Year Warranty

 

Shipping

If shipping is required we will need to quote.  Please enquire prior to ordering with the quantity of stools you would like



DIMENSIONS
W 51 x D 50,5 x H 46/78,5 cm

MATERIALS
Shell: 
Solid-coloured polypropylene

Solid wood base: 
Soap treated oak
Laquered oak
Black stained oak
With plastic gliders

COLOURS
Shell: 
White
Black

chairs.Name: About a Chair (AAC 22) by HAY
chairs.Body:
The About series is HAY’s most versatile furniture series. It began with a chair and blossomed into a series with virtually unlimited potential for residential or commercial. With the About series, Hee Welling has proven that a single strong idea can hold a wealth of development options. The About series is a true pragmatist, able to blend in or stand out, depending on the task it is assigned. Dramatize the silhouette with heavier upholstery, or opt for more subtle materials and colours. The many colour, upholstery and frame options are a particularly strong feature that allows you to tweak the design without compromising the basic concept. 

This AAC 22 is a curvy version of About a Chair and is designed to be supportive even for your arms, so you can just sit back and let the chair do the work. This version of About a Chair is available with three upholstery options: full upholstery of the whole shell, upholstery on the front of the rounded shell or a seat cushion. All three versions allow you to vary the expression with relatively simple variations in upholstery, which of course owes a great deal to fabric textures and colours. 

 2 Year Warranty

DIMENSIONS
W 59 x D 52 x H 46/79 cm

MATERIALS
Shell: 
Solid-coloured polypropylene

Base: 
Soap treated oak
Lacquered oak 
Black stained oak
With plastic or felt gliders

COLOURS
Shell: 
White
Black
Grey

All three versions allow you to vary the expression with relatively simple variations in upholstery, which of course owes a great deal to fabric textures and colours. 

 2 Year Warranty

chairs.Name: About a Chair (AAC 22) by HAY
chairs.Body:
The About series is HAY’s most versatile furniture series. It began with a chair and blossomed into a series with virtually unlimited potential for residential or commercial. With the About series, Hee Welling has proven that a single strong idea can hold a wealth of development options. The About series is a true pragmatist, able to blend in or stand out, depending on the task it is assigned. Dramatize the silhouette with heavier upholstery, or opt for more subtle materials and colours. The many colour, upholstery and frame options are a particularly strong feature that allows you to tweak the design without compromising the basic concept. 

This AAC 22 is a curvy version of About a Chair and is designed to be supportive even for your arms, so you can just sit back and let the chair do the work. This version of About a Chair is available with three upholstery options: full upholstery of the whole shell, upholstery on the front of the rounded shell or a seat cushion. All three versions allow you to vary the expression with relatively simple variations in upholstery, which of course owes a great deal to fabric textures and colours.

decor.Name: KIN 5
decor.Body:
KIN 5

The KIN 5 is the 5 shelf option and is available in 2 widths; 800mm and 1400mm.

KIN SHELVING SYSTEM

A sleek and modern modular shelving system is designed to compliment the home, office or a retail space while not using up precious floor space. Made from high tensile corrosive resistant T6 aluminum, each shelf can hold up to 50 - 80 kgs (when mounted into solid studs / nogs). Treated with matte black anodizing, a scratch resistant long lasting protection for damp or marine environments.
Designed by the principles of simple functionality, clean and uncluttered details are key. Look closer, you cannot see any screws.
We have designed the vertical bars to be positioned at 600mm and 1200mm to align with stud widths in conventional framed walls. If mounting to masonry or solid boards please use the appropriate fasteners as we include square head screws and GIB anchors.

DESIGN IDEAS

Bathroom to store towels, bathrobes, beauty & bath products or planters.
Lounge to display objects, books, or use as an entertainment wall with a TV.
Kitchen to store kitchenware or tableware.
Office to hold folders, art, pictures, books, planters or stationary.
Retail to display goods for sale or use.
Kids room to store books, toys and storage boxes.

SPECIFICATIONS

Shelf material: AL 5032
Barre / Rod / Disc & Cap material: AL 6061 T6
Holds up to 50kg per shelf (when mounted into solid studs / nogs)
L x H x D : 800 or 1400 x 1790 x 320 mm

CUSTOMISATION

We can offer a custom service to our KIN shelf system. Due to the flexible and modular design we can change the colour of the shelves and all the components. Or, if you require the shelves to fit a specific space on your wall and requires a different length, we can work with you to make it suit your needs.

The initial consultation where we discuss your design modifications is free of charge. Then, once we have all your detailed requirements we will be able to provide a concise quote for the project.

Please note, changing the design requires new drawings and technical calculations to ensure the overall size is feasible. Design fee charges will apply in order for us to deliver a solution. Please contact us so we can discuss your ideas shop@zavedo.nz .

LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 4 working days.
If NOT in stock delivery will be 8 weeks.
Any questions regarding lead times and delivery please call to discuss.

DOWNLOADS

KIN SHELVING BROCHURE .pdf
KIN SHELVING INSTALLATION GUIDE .pdf

SHIPPING

This item requires special delivery. We will contact you within one business day to discuss shipping arrangements and fees. Please email shop@zavedo.nz for a quote.
For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

WARRANTY

2 years

CARE & MAINTENANCE

Our products have been designed to last a life time. To ensure the longevity of your furniture, we recommend that it should be checked regularly for scratches, stains, and any other damage to ensure repairs are minimal and manageable.
Follow this LINK for detailed care of the KIN shelving.
If you have any queries, please email shop@zavedo.nz .

RETURNS

This item is refundable within 14 days of delivery. The customer is responsible for all return shipping costs. Please email shop@zavedo.nz if you need any further assistance.
Custom orders will not be refundable.

decor.Name: PORTO 77
decor.Body:
DESCRIPTION

This PORTO 77 handcrafted frameless mirror features polished edges, a 50mm polished edge hole, a genuine leather strap and a precision machined attachment disc.  The back is covered in matt black vinyl for safety and 2 leather discs to offset against the wall for a perfect drop shadow effect and de-misting space and properties. Installation is less than 5 minutes.

The PORTO 77 will suit foyers, rooms, hallways or any space where a reflection of yourself or the environment will compliment the space.  

SPECIFICATIONS

5mm float glass with flat polished edges and flat polished hole with matt black vinyl backing for safety.

Height: 1,100mm.  Including Strap and Disc.

Width: 590mm

Thickness: 5mm

Weight: 4.45 Kilograms

INCLUDES

Mirror

Leather strap

ZAVEDO Disc

Chicago screw

1 square head counter sunk screw.

1 Gib anchor rated to 12 KGS.

decor.Name: Porto 144 Mirror
decor.Body:
DESCRIPTION

The Porto Mirror is of the same family as the Luna Mirror and is designed with an aesthetically pleasing 590mm radius top and bottom while employing the golden ratio. We have wall mounted this full length mirror to keep the floor uncluttered and free from tripping and cleaning. Installation is so simple, the ZAVEDO disc is mounted to a wall by one counter sunk screw and is held up by a natural leather strap. Install time is less than 5 minutes.

Place the Porto Mirror in any room where you want increase light or see a head to toe view of yourself.

 SPECIFICATIONS

5mm float glass with flat polished edges and flat polished hole with matt black vinyl backing for safety.

W: 590mm

H: 1650mm (overall

T: 5mm

Weight: 9.9 Kg.

Glass load safety factor 65%.

INCLUDES

Mirror

Leather strap

ZAVEDO Disc

1 square head counter sunk screw. 

1 Gib anchor rated to 13.6 kilo grams.

decor.Name: Harlem Shelf 1400
decor.Body:
DESCRIPTION 
Distinctly ideal to display or store books, magazines, menus, art, mirrors, and physical objects that lean towards exposure and ease of access. Matte powder coat finishing in white and black for a sophisticated yet understated appeal.  Colour match a Disc or choose contrasting colours.  
Currently available in 2 lengths and 2 colours.  900 mm wide and 1400 mm  wide.  The colours are matte white and matte black.  
*Custom powder coat colours are available to suit custom projects. 
DESIGN IDEAS 
Home.  Display art, books, magazines. 
Kitchen.  Books, spice rack, menus, iPad.
Cafe / Restaurant. Store and display menus or books. 
Professional Offices. Hold and display brochures. 
Professional Reception.  Organise and display magazines and books. 
SPECIFICATION 
OA. (Over All).  Width. 1400. 
OA. Height. 115MM. Depth. 86MM. Off wall.  
ID.  Inside dimension of the shelf. Can receive products that are 74mm in diameter or thickness.
Shelf Material:  AL 5032. 
Disc Material: AL 6061 T6. 
COLOURS 
Matte Black Shelf. Powder Coat. 
Matte White Shelf. Powder Coat. 
Solid Brass DISC.  Uncoated. 
Matte Black Disc.  Anodised.

Install instructions. PDF

If IN stock we can ship within 3 working days. 
If NOT in stock delivery will be 4 weeks.

For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

2 years

decor.Name: Lunar 590 Mirror
decor.Body:
DESCRIPTION

This 590mm diameter handcrafted frameless mirror features polished edges, a 50mm polished edge hole, a genuine leather strap and a precision machined attachment disc.  The back is covered in matt black vinyl for safety and 2 leather discs to offset against the wall for a perfect drop shadow effect. Installation is less than 5 minutes.

The Lunar 590 will suit foyers, rooms, hallways or any space where a reflection of yourself or the environment will compliment the space.  Nest with the Lunar 365 for tonal or contrast effect.

2 year warranty

DIMENSIONS

Height: 920mm

Diameter: 590mm

Thickness: 5mm

SPECIFICATIONS

Height: 920mm

Diameter: 590mm

Thickness: 5mm

Weight: 3.3 Kilograms

5mm float glass with flat polished edges and flat polished hole with matt black vinyl backing for safety.

INCLUDES

Mirror

Leather strap

ZAVEDO Disc

Brass Chicago screw

1 square head counter sunk screw.

DOWNLOADS

Mirror Look Book

Instal Instruction.  PDF

furniture.Name: About a Chair Armless  (AAC-12)
furniture.Body:
The About series is HAY’s most versatile furniture series. It began with a chair and blossomed into a series with virtually unlimited potential. With the About series, Hee Welling has proven that a single strong idea can hold a wealth of development options. Today.  The About series is a true pragmatist, able to blend in or stand out, depending on the task it is assigned. Dramatize the silhouette with heavier upholstery, or opt for more subtle materials and colours. The many colour, upholstery and frame options are a particularly strong feature that allows you to tweak the design without compromising the basic concept.

About a Chair is an intuitive take on the concept of a chair. The organic posture provides good lumbar support, and the open shell invites you to take a seat. About a Chair comes in a dyed plastic version as well as a version with either frontal or full upholstery in hard-wearing furniture fabrics combined with round legs in soap-finished or lacquered oak or ash wood stained black. The many possible combinations of frame, shell and colours make About a Chair an ultra-flexible and versatile chair that celebrates individuality.

 2 Year Warranty

 

Shipping

If shipping is required we will need to quote.  Please enquire prior to ordering with the quantity of stools you would like



DIMENSIONS
W 51 x D 50,5 x H 46/78,5 cm

MATERIALS
Shell: 
Solid-coloured polypropylene

Solid wood base: 
Soap treated oak
Laquered oak
Black stained oak
With plastic gliders

COLOURS
Shell: 
White
Black

furniture.Name: About a Chair Armless  (AAC-12)
furniture.Body:
The About series is HAY’s most versatile furniture series. It began with a chair and blossomed into a series with virtually unlimited potential. With the About series, Hee Welling has proven that a single strong idea can hold a wealth of development options. Today.  The About series is a true pragmatist, able to blend in or stand out, depending on the task it is assigned. Dramatize the silhouette with heavier upholstery, or opt for more subtle materials and colours. The many colour, upholstery and frame options are a particularly strong feature that allows you to tweak the design without compromising the basic concept.

About a Chair is an intuitive take on the concept of a chair. The organic posture provides good lumbar support, and the open shell invites you to take a seat. About a Chair comes in a dyed plastic version as well as a version with either frontal or full upholstery in hard-wearing furniture fabrics combined with round legs in soap-finished or lacquered oak or ash wood stained black. The many possible combinations of frame, shell and colours make About a Chair an ultra-flexible and versatile chair that celebrates individuality.

 2 Year Warranty

 

Shipping

If shipping is required we will need to quote.  Please enquire prior to ordering with the quantity of stools you would like

furniture.Name: About a Chair (AAC 22) by HAY
furniture.Body:
The About series is HAY’s most versatile furniture series. It began with a chair and blossomed into a series with virtually unlimited potential for residential or commercial. With the About series, Hee Welling has proven that a single strong idea can hold a wealth of development options. The About series is a true pragmatist, able to blend in or stand out, depending on the task it is assigned. Dramatize the silhouette with heavier upholstery, or opt for more subtle materials and colours. The many colour, upholstery and frame options are a particularly strong feature that allows you to tweak the design without compromising the basic concept. 

This AAC 22 is a curvy version of About a Chair and is designed to be supportive even for your arms, so you can just sit back and let the chair do the work. This version of About a Chair is available with three upholstery options: full upholstery of the whole shell, upholstery on the front of the rounded shell or a seat cushion. All three versions allow you to vary the expression with relatively simple variations in upholstery, which of course owes a great deal to fabric textures and colours. 

 2 Year Warranty

furniture.Name: About a Stool by Hay
furniture.Body:
The Hay About A Stool is the product of a close collaboration between designer Hee Welling and Hay. It is a simple yet functional design that lends itself to all interior environments.  The seat is bolted to a large high quality metal plate that is moulded into the seat.  This is a stool that will last a lifetime in design and material and is superbly comfortable to sit on due to the slopping back rest which provides great support.

Dimensions
Available in two heights: 75cm & 85cm
Height: 75cm (Seat Height: 65cm) x Width: 47cm x Depth: 43cm.  Domestic purpose.
Height: 85cm (Seat Height: 75cm) x Width: 47cm x Depth: 46cm.  Commercial purpose.

Materials & finishes
Shell in polypropylene with oak veneered or black stained ash frame and black powder coated steel foot rest.

 

Shipping

If shipping is required we will need to quote.  Please enquire prior to ordering with the quantity of stools you would like

harlem.Name: Harlem Shelf 900
harlem.Body:
DESCRIPTION

The HARLEM SHELF is part of Zavedo's first self-designed Collection, called The Wall Collection. This is a collection of wall products that combines our appreciation for refined, practical, versatile and timeless design. For us detail, quality of material and engineering precision is key in this line.

Distinctly ideal to display or store books, magazines, menus, art, mirrors, and physical objects that lean towards exposure and ease of access. Matte powder coat finishing in white and black for a sophisticated yet understated appeal.  Colour match a Disc or choose contrasting colours. 

Currently available in 2 lengths and 2 colours.  900 mm wide and 1400 mm  wide.  The colours are matte white and matte black. 

*Custom powder coat colours are available to suit custom projects.

DESIGN IDEAS 

Home.  Display art, books, magazines. 
Kitchen.  Books, spice rack, menus, iPad.
Cafe / Restaurant. Store and display menus or books. 
Professional Offices. Hold and display brochures. 
Professional Reception.  Organise and display magazines and books. 

SPECIFICATION 

OA. (Over All).  Width. 1400. OA. Height. 115MM. Depth. 86MM. Off wall.  
ID.  Inside dimension of the shelf. Can receive products that are 74mm in diameter or thickness.
Shelf Material:  AL 5032. 
Disc Material: AL 6061 T6.

COLOURS

Matte Black Shelf. Powder Coat.

Matte White Shelf. Powder Coat.

Solid Brass DISC.  Uncoated.

Matte Black Disc.  Anodised.

DOWNLOADS

Brochure. PDF

Install instructions. PDF

LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 3 working days.

If NOT in stock delivery will be 4 weeks. 

SHIPPING

Shipping within NZ will be calculated at checkout. 

For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

WARRANTY

2 years

CARE & MAINTENANCE

Our products have been designed to last a life time. To ensure the longevity of your furniture, we recommend that it should be checked regularly for scratches, stains, and any other damage to ensure repairs are minimal and manageable.

Follow this link for detailed care of the HARLEM shelving. 

If you have any queries, please email shop@zavedo.nz 

RETURNS

This item is refundable within 14 days of delivery. The customer is responsible for all return shipping costs. Please email shop@zavedo.nz if you need any further assistance.

Custom orders will not be refundable.

harlem.Name: Harlem Shelf 900
harlem.Body:
DESCRIPTION

The HARLEM SHELF is part of Zavedo's first self-designed Collection, called The Wall Collection. This is a collection of wall products that combines our appreciation for refined, practical, versatile and timeless design. For us detail, quality of material and engineering precision is key in this line.

Distinctly ideal to display or store books, magazines, menus, art, mirrors, and physical objects that lean towards exposure and ease of access. Matte powder coat finishing in white and black for a sophisticated yet understated appeal.  Colour match a Disc or choose contrasting colours. 

Currently available in 2 lengths and 2 colours.  900 mm wide and 1400 mm  wide.  The colours are matte white and matte black. 

*Custom powder coat colours are available to suit custom projects.

DESIGN IDEAS 

Home.  Display art, books, magazines. 
Kitchen.  Books, spice rack, menus, iPad.
Cafe / Restaurant. Store and display menus or books. 
Professional Offices. Hold and display brochures. 
Professional Reception.  Organise and display magazines and books. 

SPECIFICATION 

OA. (Over All).  Width. 1400. OA. Height. 115MM. Depth. 86MM. Off wall.  
ID.  Inside dimension of the shelf. Can receive products that are 74mm in diameter or thickness.
Shelf Material:  AL 5032. 
Disc Material: AL 6061 T6.

COLOURS

Matte Black Shelf. Powder Coat.

Matte White Shelf. Powder Coat.

Solid Brass DISC.  Uncoated.

Matte Black Disc.  Anodised.

living.Name: PORTO 77
living.Body:
DESCRIPTION

This PORTO 77 handcrafted frameless mirror features polished edges, a 50mm polished edge hole, a genuine leather strap and a precision machined attachment disc.  The back is covered in matt black vinyl for safety and 2 leather discs to offset against the wall for a perfect drop shadow effect and de-misting space and properties. Installation is less than 5 minutes.

The PORTO 77 will suit foyers, rooms, hallways or any space where a reflection of yourself or the environment will compliment the space.  

SPECIFICATIONS

5mm float glass with flat polished edges and flat polished hole with matt black vinyl backing for safety.

Height: 1,100mm.  Including Strap and Disc.

Width: 590mm

Thickness: 5mm

Weight: 4.45 Kilograms

INCLUDES

Mirror

Leather strap

ZAVEDO Disc

Chicago screw

1 square head counter sunk screw.

1 Gib anchor rated to 12 KGS.

 DOWNLOADS

PORTO77 Installation Instruction

Mirror Look Book

LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 3 working days.

If NOT in stock delivery will be 2 weeks.

SHIPPING

This item requires special delivery. We will contact you within one business day to discuss shipping arrangements and fees. Please email shop@zavedo.nz for a quote. 

For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

WARRANTY

2 years

living.Name: Porto 144 Mirror
living.Body:
DESCRIPTION

The Porto Mirror is of the same family as the Luna Mirror and is designed with an aesthetically pleasing 590mm radius top and bottom while employing the golden ratio. We have wall mounted this full length mirror to keep the floor uncluttered and free from tripping and cleaning. Installation is so simple, the ZAVEDO disc is mounted to a wall by one counter sunk screw and is held up by a natural leather strap. Install time is less than 5 minutes.

Place the Porto Mirror in any room where you want increase light or see a head to toe view of yourself.

 SPECIFICATIONS

5mm float glass with flat polished edges and flat polished hole with matt black vinyl backing for safety.

W: 590mm

H: 1650mm (overall

T: 5mm

Weight: 9.9 Kg.

Glass load safety factor 65%.

INCLUDES

Mirror

Leather strap

ZAVEDO Disc

1 square head counter sunk screw. 

1 Gib anchor rated to 13.6 kilo grams.

mirrors.Body:
DESCRIPTION

The Porto Mirror is of the same family as the Luna Mirror and is designed with an aesthetically pleasing 590mm radius top and bottom while employing the golden ratio. We have wall mounted this full length mirror to keep the floor uncluttered and free from tripping and cleaning. Installation is so simple, the ZAVEDO disc is mounted to a wall by one counter sunk screw and is held up by a natural leather strap. Install time is less than 5 minutes.

Place the Porto Mirror in any room where you want increase light or see a head to toe view of yourself.

shelves.Name: KIN 5
shelves.Body:
KIN 5

The KIN 5 is the 5 shelf option and is available in 2 widths; 800mm and 1400mm.

KIN SHELVING SYSTEM

A sleek and modern modular shelving system is designed to compliment the home, office or a retail space while not using up precious floor space. Made from high tensile corrosive resistant T6 aluminum, each shelf can hold up to 50 - 80 kgs (when mounted into solid studs / nogs). Treated with matte black anodizing, a scratch resistant long lasting protection for damp or marine environments.
Designed by the principles of simple functionality, clean and uncluttered details are key. Look closer, you cannot see any screws.
We have designed the vertical bars to be positioned at 600mm and 1200mm to align with stud widths in conventional framed walls. If mounting to masonry or solid boards please use the appropriate fasteners as we include square head screws and GIB anchors.

DESIGN IDEAS

Bathroom to store towels, bathrobes, beauty & bath products or planters.
Lounge to display objects, books, or use as an entertainment wall with a TV.
Kitchen to store kitchenware or tableware.
Office to hold folders, art, pictures, books, planters or stationary.
Retail to display goods for sale or use.
Kids room to store books, toys and storage boxes.

SPECIFICATIONS

Shelf material: AL 5032
Barre / Rod / Disc & Cap material: AL 6061 T6
Holds up to 50kg per shelf (when mounted into solid studs / nogs)
L x H x D : 800 or 1400 x 1790 x 320 mm

CUSTOMISATION

We can offer a custom service to our KIN shelf system. Due to the flexible and modular design we can change the colour of the shelves and all the components. Or, if you require the shelves to fit a specific space on your wall and requires a different length, we can work with you to make it suit your needs.

The initial consultation where we discuss your design modifications is free of charge. Then, once we have all your detailed requirements we will be able to provide a concise quote for the project.

Please note, changing the design requires new drawings and technical calculations to ensure the overall size is feasible. Design fee charges will apply in order for us to deliver a solution. Please contact us so we can discuss your ideas shop@zavedo.nz .

LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 4 working days.
If NOT in stock delivery will be 8 weeks.
Any questions regarding lead times and delivery please call to discuss.

DOWNLOADS

KIN SHELVING BROCHURE .pdf
KIN SHELVING INSTALLATION GUIDE .pdf

SHIPPING

This item requires special delivery. We will contact you within one business day to discuss shipping arrangements and fees. Please email shop@zavedo.nz for a quote.
For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

WARRANTY

2 years

CARE & MAINTENANCE

Our products have been designed to last a life time. To ensure the longevity of your furniture, we recommend that it should be checked regularly for scratches, stains, and any other damage to ensure repairs are minimal and manageable.
Follow this LINK for detailed care of the KIN shelving.
If you have any queries, please email shop@zavedo.nz .

RETURNS

This item is refundable within 14 days of delivery. The customer is responsible for all return shipping costs. Please email shop@zavedo.nz if you need any further assistance.
Custom orders will not be refundable.

Please note, changing the design requires new drawings and technical calculations to ensure the overall size is feasible. Design fee charges will apply in order for us to deliver a solution. Please contact us so we can discuss your ideas shop@zavedo.nz .

LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 4 working days.
If NOT in stock delivery will be 8 weeks.
Any questions regarding lead times and delivery please call to discuss.

stools.Name: About a Stool by Hay
stools.Body:
The Hay About A Stool is the product of a close collaboration between designer Hee Welling and Hay. It is a simple yet functional design that lends itself to all interior environments.  The seat is bolted to a large high quality metal plate that is moulded into the seat.  This is a stool that will last a lifetime in design and material and is superbly comfortable to sit on due to the slopping back rest which provides great support.

Dimensions
Available in two heights: 75cm & 85cm
Height: 75cm (Seat Height: 65cm) x Width: 47cm x Depth: 43cm.  Domestic purpose.
Height: 85cm (Seat Height: 75cm) x Width: 47cm x Depth: 46cm.  Commercial purpose.

Materials & finishes
Shell in polypropylene with oak veneered or black stained ash frame and black powder coated steel foot rest.

 

Shipping

If shipping is required we will need to quote.  Please enquire prior to ordering with the quantity of stools you would like

wall-hooks.Name: SOHO HOOK 100
wall-hooks.Body:
DESCRIPTION

The SOHO HOOK is part of Zavedo's first self-designed Collection, called The Wall Collection. This is a collection of wall products that combines our appreciation for refined, practical, versatile and timeless design. For us detail, quality of material and engineering precision is key in this line. 

SOHO HOOK is a sophisticated, minimalist hook designed to hold your jacket, coat, robe, towel, apron, or any home object that needs to be hung or displayed with a little style.  For use in the bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, reception, retail and commercial spaces.

The hook is a 2 piece construction with a base and a cap. The base is screwed into a wall, door or cabinet with a supplied counter sunk square head screw.  The cap threads onto the base to hide the screw.

The grooved edge detailing is more than aesthetic, its purpose is to provide extra grip for items that would be draped over the edge.

DESIGN IDEAS
  • Mix and match colours and diameters for a random look.
  • Use 3 for balance and harmony.
  • The SOHO 100 can be used for cabinetry pullers or for a dramatic effect.
  • Use the SOHO 100 to hold shopping bags in any retail environment so you can display your brand with a touch of class and have the bags easily accessible.
SPECIFICATION
  • Diameter: 100mm.
  • Depth: 35mm.
  • Material: AL 6061 T6, high tensile alloy.  Solid Brass.
  • Colours:  Matte black anodising.  Matte white powder coat. Solid Brass.
  • Note: The brass will patina over time.
DOWNLOADS
  • Product specification. PDF
  • Install instruction. PDF
LEAD TIMES

If IN stock we can ship within 3 working days.

If NOT in stock delivery will be 4 weeks.

SHIPPING

Shipping within NZ will be calculated at checkout. 

For international orders, please contact us for a shipping quote before placing your order.

    WARRANTY

    2 years

    Our products have been designed to last a life time. To ensure the longevity of your furniture, we recommend that it should be checked regularly for scratches, stains, and any other damage to ensure repairs are minimal and manageable.

    If you have any queries, please email shop@zavedo.nz .

    RETURNS

    Custom orders will not be refundable.
